sentences.en: A brief, somewhat unorthodox, review of Regularization Theory is presented.
sentences.cn: 一开始我们会多多少少非正统地简要的回顾一下正规化理论.

sentences.en: Did anything unorthodox happen during his interrogation?
sentences.cn: 在他的调查过程中没发生什么违反规定的事?

sentences.en: He has an unorthodox style of playing tennis, but he usually wins.
sentences.cn: 他打网球的风格不合乎正统, 但他通常总是赢球.

sentences.en: His methods were unorthodox, and his lifestyle eccentric.
sentences.cn: 他的方法不同寻常，他的生活方式也相当奇特。

sentences.en: His playing drips with exaggerated rubato and unorthodox tempi ( Annalyn Swan )
sentences.cn: 他的演奏渗透着夸张诡异的节奏 ( 安纳莱恩斯旺 )

sentences.en: I'm afraid your English is somewhat unorthodox.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你的英语有点不正规.

sentences.en: In some cases they are inadequate, and unorthodox means must be employed.
sentences.cn: 在某些情况下他们是不够的, 非传统的方法必须采用.

sentences.en: Many doctors don't approve of unorthodox medicine.
sentences.cn: 许多医生不赞成使用非传统药品.

sentences.en: No holds were barred for the Prince's unorthodox education.
sentences.cn: 王子的非正统教育没受过什么约束.

sentences.en: Once again , final diagnosis was unorthodox, but clever.
sentences.cn: 和上集一样, 最后的诊断不同寻常, 但是很机智.

sentences.en: People who hold unorthodox opinions are sometimes ostracized.
sentences.cn: 持有非传统见解的人有时会遭到排斥.

sentences.en: She had an unorthodox technique , but was an excellent player.
sentences.cn: 她不是科班出身, 但却身手不凡.

sentences.en: Some people would consider your methods most unorthodox.
sentences.cn: 有些人会以为你的方法是最异端的.

sentences.en: The charity says the journalists appear to have obtained confidential documents in an unorthodox manner.
sentences.cn: 慈善机构称那些记者似乎以非正常手段取得了秘密文件。

sentences.en: The reality-based show followed the unorthodox lives of Ozzy, his wife Sharon, daughter Kelly, and son, Jack.
sentences.cn: 这个写实剧取材于奥兹、其妻莎伦、女儿凯莉和儿子杰克的另类生活。

sentences.en: You could not say that he was unorthodox.

words.tran_cn: 非正统的；异端的；异教的

trans.tran_cn: 非正统的，异端的，异教的，左
trans.tran_en: unorthodox opinions or methods are different from what is usual or accepted by most people
